item.title: Mirror Controller Shapes Documentation
item.description: Are you tired of manually repositioning asymmetrical components to match control curves on the opposite side in Maya?

item.title: PyCharm autocomplete setup for MotionBuilder scripting
item.description: PyCharm, a popular Python IDE, can greatly enhance your scripting experience in MotionBuilder.

item.title: Duplicate objects along curve
item.description: beads In this post, I will describe how we can duplicate objects along a curve using Maya Mash.

item.title: Welcome to my Blog!!
item.description: After more than a decade of immersing myself in the world of CG and gaming, I have finally made the decision to start my own blog.
